title: #141: Analyzing the 911 Calls - The Staircase
description:
Jim, Laura and Lisa continue their discussions about the @netflix show “The Staircase”. Jim and Laura analyse the 911 calls made by Michael Peterson on the landline at 1810 Cedar Street, Durham, North Carolina on December 9 2001. The first call was made at 02.40 and the second was at 02.46.


Two minutes after receiving the call paramedics Jay Rose and Ron Paige had been dispatched and were on way to the scene.


The #RCP team discuss what the paramedics discovered when they arrived at the Peterson home.


#HerNameWasKathleen 

#TheStaircase


This Episode of Real Crime Profile is sponsored by SimpliSafe
